page.title: 16Life is........
page.content: Life is like climbing up a hill.Some parts are steep and some parts are easy to get up.Sometimes you fall on steep bits,but it is easy to get up again and carry on.Usually though it can be hard.Just as you think you are getting to the top you may find that there is still another ridge to climb. Then as you reach the summit you have a glorious feeling,but you have to go back down the hill.You have conquered that hill.You may have conquered other small hills,but there are still many larger hills to climb.You cannot climb every hill,but you must climb all the hills that you can climb until you can climb no longer.Then your life is at an end. Sally Hodgetts aged 12 yrs
